title: Seagate 1.5TB ST31500341AS Firmware Update
description:
-----------------------------------------------------
  [SEAGATE ST31500341AS |1,5TB|32MB Cache|7200RPM]
-----------------------------------------------------
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Drive model : ST31500341AS <<<<<<<<<<<<
-----------------------------------------------------

 THESE ARE LEGIT FIRMWARES FOR THIS DRIVE AND THEY
 BEEN TESTED AND WORKING FINE!

 There are some serious problems with early shipped
 Seagate 1,5TB drives , model # ST31500341AS , with
 early firmwares. So here are 2 .ZIP files with
 updated firmwares for it's drive with different FW
 listed further below.
 The steps are simple:

 - To make a bootable floppy-diskette then run the
   .EXE file and insert a empty floppy disk.

 - To make a bootable CD-ROM then burn the .ISO image
   to a CDR.

 Either way, you need to reboot your PC with the
 bootable madia inserted then follow directions by
 the flash tool when booted.

 READ carefully the FWReadMe.txt files found in the
 ZIP files.
 
 I RECOMMEND YOU REMOVE OTHER DRIVES CONNECTED TO YOUR 
 MOTHERBOARD/CONTROLLER AND KEEP ONLY THE DRIVE YOU
 WANT TO UPDATE CONNECTED!

-----------------------------------------------------
 IF YOUR DRIVE LABEL IS :

 P/N      : 9JU138-301
 Firmware : CC1F, CC1G 
            - You should update to
              Firmware: CC1H or later.
      USE : ST31500341AS_CC1H.ZIP   
-----------------------------------------------------
 OR IF YOUR DRIVE LABEL IS :

 P/N      : 9JU138-300 ,366
 Firmware : SD17, SD15, SD18
            - You should update to
              Firmware: SD1A
      USE : ST31500341AS_SD1A.ZIP
-----------------------------------------------------
  [SEAGATE ST31500341AS |1,5TB|32MB Cache|7200RPM]
-----------------------------------------------------

DO NOT TRY THIS IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOUR ARE DOING!

GOOD LUCK!

/ Wackopath

-----------------------------------------------------
